_header: Of no man like makes hap in a stound many rich
_description: On Fortune — four English and three Latin lines with internal rhyme

CamCCC405.First Lines:
Of noman liche makeȝ hap in a stound many RicheHym can he so
                    fette Wer yt fyrst Hym fond sone setteEt res
                    exsempli…
CamCCC405.Last Lines:
…Ilk Wisman takeȝ forbysue wat pride maketOf Wylum
                    templeis wyh helde non cyre til hem pres
CamCCC405.Note:
These first English lines preceded by Latin couplet, Quem fortuna
                        leuis miserum facit esse beatum / Sit fortunatum degradat hora breuis
                    (f. 10v).
